Text: Near the end of a Friday| Jess has come up to you looking worried.

Speaker: Jess
Text: The Medsurance report isn't going to be ready by the end of the day.

Speaker: You
Text: It's due by Monday morning isn't it?

Speaker: Jess
Text: I need to the weekend to work on this.

Speaker: You
Text: But the only way to access the database is here in the office.

Speaker: Jess
Text: If I can copy the database onto a drive| I can finish the report at home.

Speaker: You
Text: There is sensitive medical data on the databse.

Speaker: Jess
Text: I will be extremely careful I promise.
